name: TravisCI
natural_language_description: 这是 TravisCI 节点。主要用于: Consume TravisCI API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: build

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: cancel
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many builds

buildId.name: buildId
buildId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Build ID | 作用: Value uniquely identifying the build

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: message (值: None) - Travis-ci status message attached to the request

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

slug.name: slug
slug.natural_language_description: 参数名: Slug | 作用: Same as {ownerName}/{repositoryName}

branch.name: branch
branch.natural_language_description: 参数名: Branch | 作用: Branch requested to be built
